entries.journal_entry_description: Hunt and kill uller warhoofs on the Bocctyyy Path.
entries.task01_journal_entry_description: To start the uller warhoof bet, go to the Bocctyyy Path. Speak to the shuttle pilot at the main Rodian camp to get there.
entries.task01_journal_entry_title: Uller Warhoof Bet: Go to Bocctyyy Path
entries.task04_journal_entry_description: Hunt and kill uller warhoofs on the Bocctyyy path. To win the bet, you must kill more uller warhoofs than Sordaan's hunters have: 24 of them in 20 minutes or less.
entries.task04_journal_entry_title: Uller Warhoof Bet: Hunt and kill uller warhoofs.
